results.definition: move into the foreground to make more visible or prominent
examples: The introduction highlighted the speaker's distinguished career in linguistics

results.definition: the most interesting or memorable part
examples: the highlight of the tour was our visit to the Vatican

results.definition: an area of lightness in a picture
apply a highlighter to one's cheeks or eyebrows in order to make them more prominent
examples: highlight the area above your eyebrows
